summary: Replaces vanilla Imperial Shield with johnskyrim\'s Imperial Legion shield.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces vanilla Imperial Shield (Light and Heavy) model with the johnskyrim\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40604]Imperial Legion[/url] shield. 
First, you need to download johnskyrim\'s mod, here :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40604//?

Thanks to johnskyrim for giving me the permission to create this mod.

MY OTHER MODS :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21951][img]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/8950/dqfu.png[/img][/url]
author: johnskyrim and XMen19

files.name: Imperial Shield Replacer - The Imperial Legion
files.fileName: Imperial Shield Replacer - The Imperial Legion-45329-v-1-0.rar
